_header: Holy Saints Edward and Saint Louis
Subjects: pageant verses; Henry VI, coronation; chronicles, verse in; Edward the Confessor, saint; Louis, saint
_description: Verse accompanying a soteltie at the coronation of Henry VI (1432) — one 8-line stanza

HarEng766.Transcription:
Hooly Seintes Edward and seint LowiceConcerve this braunche born of
                    your blissid bloodLyue among Cristen moost soueraign of
                    priceEnheritour of the fflourdelice soo goodThis Sixte henry to Reigne
                    and to be WiseGod graunt he may to be of your moodAnd that he may
                    Resemble your knyghthod & vertuePrayeth ye hartely vnto our
                    Ihesu
